Description:
Adversaries may attempt to enumerate software for a variety of reasons, such as figuring out what security measures are present or if the compromised system has a version of software that is vulnerable.

Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Detected Windows Software Discovery
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\reg.exe' and (command like '%query%' and command like '%\software\%' and command like '%/v%' and command like '%svcversion%')
